text: The men's K-4 500 metres kayaking event at the 2019 Pan American Games was held on 28th of July at the Albufera Medio Mundo in the city of Huacho. ==Results== ===Final=== {|class="wikitable" width=50% style="text- align:center" |- !Rank !Athletes !Country !Time |- | |align=left|Manuel Lascano Juan Caceres Ezequiel Di Giacomo Gonzalo Carreras |align=left| |1:22.106 |- | |align=left|Reinier Carrera Renier Mora Robert Benítez Fidel Vargas |align=left| |1:23.039 |- | |align=left|Javier Lopez Juan Rodriguez Mauricio Figueroa Osbaldo Fuentes |align=left| |1:23.106 |- |4 |align=left|Jarret Kenke Eric Ellery Dominik Crête Marshall Hughes |align=left| |1:23.871 |- |5 |align=left|Stanton Collins Nathaniel Errez Carl Crockett Owen Farleyklacik |align=left| |1:25.011 |- |6 |align=left|Patrick Faustino Edson Silva Vagner Souta Pedro Costa |align=left| |1:25.436 |- |7 |align=left|Sebastian Delgado Matias Otero Julian Cabrera Jose Lopez |align=left| |1:25.901 |} ==References== ==External links== *Results Category:Canoeing at the 2019 Pan American Games
title: Canoeing at the 2019 Pan American Games – Men's K-4 500 metres
